ComicInfo.Summary: Untitled: Knightmare interrupts a weapons buy between his former mob boss and the Russians. While Knightmare battles Logan, the assassin who killed his family, a Yakuza plant stabs Don Carbone and activates a nuclear bomb that was part of the purchase.
